content.raw:
Ok, let's start with this pull request since I think it's the easiest to get merged!

Comments so far:

* There is a exception raised if you load a shot that has no shutters because the "shutters" group in the HDF5 file doesn't exist
* Similar to this, while you catch and ignore the exception if the shot has not been compiled with the latest version of labscript (that saves the open state to the connection table), the check box is still visible. This confused me for quite a while (as I didn't know why the shutter markers were not showing up until I went hunting through the code!). If there are no shutter markers, we should disable the checkbox (and probably have a tooltip that explains why - either legacy shot file that doesn't support shutter markers, or no shutters).
* The width of the Shutter column seems quite wide by default. You might want to consider shrinking it if it's easy (though to be honest, if you just want to leave it we can clean this one up in another pull request since the rest of the interface defaults to silly sizes anyway).

Given the "beta" nature of runviewer in general, I think I'm happy to merge once the backwards compatibility issues are fixed (as above). I'm still not sure I'm 100% happy with the interface/colouring, but I don't think there's much point messing around with it now. Maybe once all of the current changes are merged in I'll find the time to play around and see if I can propose something better.
